aboutpara: Growth-focused Full-Stack Developer who doubled department sales and expanded operations by 80% at Electra Consumer Products. In 5+ years, I've driven measurable business results including 100% productivity increases through AI solutions, 300% social media growth (40K to 120K+ Telegram subscribers), and 60% performance improvements. My technical expertise in React, Python, PHP, and Magento 2 is consistently applied to solve real business challenges - from generating 65 daily leads with 60% conversion rates to reducing operational time by 50%. Currently completing B.Sc. Computer Science with 88 GPA, I combine strategic business thinking with deep technical skills to create solutions that directly impact the bottom line and accelerate company growth.
